snippet: Carlos Mercado, 45, who was diabetic, died after 15 hours at the New York jail complex. His family’s lawyers say surveillance video shows that guards repeatedly ignored his pleas for help.

byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and MICHAEL WINERIP

lead_paragraph: Carlos Mercado, 45, who was diabetic, died after 15 hours at the New York jail complex. His family’s lawyers say surveillance video shows that guards repeatedly ignored his pleas for help.

headline.main: An Unanswered Call for Help at Rikers Island
